title: National Institute of Health Research
info: Currently we are delivering a NIHR funded research project, trialling a musculoskeletal application ‘FLX Health’ within a population of individuals who have previously had a brain injury.

title: United Kingdom Research Innovation (UKRI)
info: We have successfully received two UKRI grants. Currently, we are working on a Biomedical Catalyst Grant to develop and design wireframes of a Patient Portal application to accompany Kompass. Previously, we received grant funding after the founder of Kompass was awarded the Women in Innovation award, to develop a Data Dashboard for the Kompass platform.

title: European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) and Health Innovation Manchester (HiM)
info: Funding from these organizations supported the deployment of Kompass within a stroke service to investigate the use of the app in an NHS setting.

title: Salford Royal NHS Foundation Trust
info: Kompass worked in conjunction with Salford Royal NHS Foundation Trust to complete a service-wide audit, testing the Data Dashboard and harnessing technology to perform administrative tasks.
